unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Do You Have a Passport? What is the Probability?
question_text:
According to the U. S. Department of State, as of January 2013, about $37\%$ of all Americans had a passport.
Assuming this percentage has not changed, what is the probability that in a randomly selected sample of $4$ Americans, more than half would have a passport?
